availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred Marcum (Breathitt County, KY, farmer and blacksmith)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and blacksmith. North Carolina native. Married to Joanna Marcum. Father of Edward Marcum, Thomas Marcum, Mahala Marcum, Robert Marcum, Elizabeth Marcum, Daniel Marcum, Mary Marcum, and Jas B. Marcum. Farmer and blacksmith in Breathitt County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Breathitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 341.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 174B.
